name: Item Pick Up Message
author: Joe123
info: When the player picks up an item with this script in its pick up slot, it will display a string.
description: When the player picks up an item with this script in its pick up slot, it will display a string.
setup: Set this script in the Pickup Slot of any item you wish to have a message show up when the player picks it up.D0 is the string number to display when the player picks up the item.
